name: BD Bike Shop
info: Complete login system with google login and Email Password.A bike-shop website including admin panel to add or remove items,to confirm orders,to access all orders.After login user can purchase items,can check own orders ,can delete orders,can add review.

name: Travel Planner
info: It has a Complete login system with google login,After login User can add new services, can book a service, can confirm booking, and can also delete a booking,Users can check their own orders and all orders of other users

name: Private Hospital
info: A hospital providing some services.It also includes google sign in,email-password and private routing methods.The patient can book an appointment.
